Issue.creator: toktar
Issue.summary: Ð¡hange key in requests map and field reqIdr in Pre Prepare and Ordered
Issue.description: Change key in requests map from (request id, DID) to digest owing to which will change field reqIdr in Pre Prepare and Ordered. Because if 2 clients with same DID send request with same request_id. Request map uses this value as a key. In this case we will have collision of requests and different request data on different nodes.
